# SafeCast
[Git Source](https://gitlab.com/nomadhub/smart-contracts/blob/e023936db04d0b7e2f5bfdf55b2bcf9f827cb12c/contracts/v2/external/@pancakeswap/infinity-core/src/pool-bin/libraries/math/SafeCast.sol)

This library contains functions to safely cast uint256 to different uint types.


## Functions
### _revertOverflow


```solidity
function _revertOverflow() private pure;
```

### safe248

Returns x on uint248 and check that it does not overflow


```solidity
function safe248(uint256 x) internal pure returns (uint248 y);
```
**Parameters**

|Name|Type|Description|
|----|----|-----------|
|`x`|`uint256`|The value as an uint256|

**Returns**

|Name|Type|Description|
|----|----|-----------|
|`y`|`uint248`|The value as an uint248|

## Errors
### SafeCastOverflow

```solidity
error SafeCastOverflow();
```
